mapper.select: select * from attendance where attendancetim LIKE #{attendancetim}"%"

SELECT aaa.* from ( SELECT *,left(ATTENDANCETIM,8) FROM `attendance` where ( STR_TO_DATE(WORKINGHOURS,'%H:%i') > STR_TO_DATE('08:30','%H:%i') or STR_TO_DATE(OFFHOURS,'%H:%i') < STR_TO_DATE('17:30','%H:%i') ) and ( right(ATTENDANCETIM,3) = #{Mon} or right(ATTENDANCETIM,3) = #{Tus} or right(ATTENDANCETIM,3) = #{Wed} or right(ATTENDANCETIM,3) = #{Thu} or right(ATTENDANCETIM,3) = #{Fri} or left(ATTENDANCETIM,8) in (SELECT right(WORKINGDATE,8) from workingday where type=4) ) ) as aaa where aaa.attendancetim LIKE #{attendancetim}"%"
select * from attendance where attendancetim LIKE #{nowMons}"%" or attendancetim LIKE #{lastMons}"%" having names = #{id} order by attendancetim desc
